extendedInfo.description: â Discover many magical and secret recipes! â Build skyscrapers of delicious Candy!â Restock your Sweet Shop with tasty candy treats.â Sell Candy to spoil cute and adorable furry animals in Candy Island, â Play Wheel of Fortune and enjoy endless fun with your friends and family. â¥â¥â¥ DOWNLOAD 4 FREE! NOW â¥â¥â¥Features:â¥ PLAY OFFLINE! No internet connection requiredâ¥ DISCOVER delicious candy recipesâ¥ SHARE sweet gifts and help your friendsâ¥ CARE for your adorable helpers and customersâ¥ BUILD from a tiny tower to the biggest candy mountainâ¥ DECORATE and dress up the blue sky with dozens floating islandsâ¥ CONNECT and socialize with your communityâ¥ NEW CONTENT constantly addedâ¥ FREE and EASY to playTHE STORYThe story of Candy Island takes place in a happy and enchanted world, inhabited by a zoo of adorable little monsters around the tasty candy farm. Everything is in balance... until one sad summer day the maniac villain Dr. Zog returns from his dark candy valley and crush every bakery store, chocolate factory and tiny sugar tower. All delicious recipes got stolen and there is no more food from the candy farm. Just one last recipe is found and there is still hope that the great sweets factory can be rebuilt. A new beginning!â¥â¥â¥ 60+  Different Candy levels and factories to rebuild! â¥â¥â¥Sweets: Candy lovers beware, you won't be able to resist the sweet treats we have for you in our Candy Valley!- Lollipop- Licorice- Gummy fruit- Gummy snakes- Lollies- Bubblegum Factory- Snowie Sweets- Gummy bears- Marshmallows- Drops- Cotton candyCakes: Build Decorate and Discover, delicious factories like:- Muffins- Cookies- Donuts- Pancakes- Gingerbread hearts- Waffles- Apple Pie- Cupcakes- Chocolate CroissantsCandy: Unlock many different Chocolate, Cakes & Sweet recipes for your factory.ChocolatePralinesChocolate & Sweets Maker! Your taste buds will force you to the nearest candy restaurant or bakery store!- Cotton- Gummy Fish- Candy corn- Jellyfish- Fudge- Caramel fudgeDrinks Maker!- Milkshake - Hot chocolate Fruits and Vegetables Collector!- Apple- Strawberries- Hazelnut Cream- MushroomsDessert Maker!- Pudding- Ice cream- Ice popsBe the mamma of excellent cooking by playing daily to receive awesome new hidden secret recipes! To build a candy or sweets factory is just as amazing a feeling as dressing up for prom night. Dress your candy salon with cute decorations and enjoy the touch of love! Playing Candy Island is a fashion accessory that is suitable for any lady.Enjoy the music, dance the night away with the lovely and adorable beanies, add a touch of seasonal "disco" decorations and enjoy! just like in High School! Candy Lovers! Collect charms and coins, receive daily gifts, discover hidden or secret recipes and unlock exciting new levels in this addictively fun game.Stop Dr Zog from breeding, hatching and raising more Dr ZogÂ´s helpers on the magical island. Help find all lost recipes that Dr.Zog and his dragon friends stole. Bring back love, joy and happy relationships between the cute zoo animals.Meet Candy Island Animal friendsElephants, Bunnies,Dogs,Cats,Cows,mouse,birds,kittens,chickens,bees,fishesCome on letâs get all our friends and family together to hunt for the lost recipes, before school starts, during break time and before we go to bed.Letâs go recreate the most amazing candy farm in a happy wonderland of sweets and sugar!â¥â¥â¥ COME ON, WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR! â¥â¥â¥

reviews.title: Sweet and fun
reviews.comment: This game is sooo sweet it  makes my mouth water with fun. So addictive and delicious.
reviews.author: Raven Brown

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: I can play for hours! Most fun  I have had in awhile with a game!
reviews.author: Dayana Romero

reviews.title: Thumbs up!
reviews.comment: Cool! However, I wish I can buy charms using it\'s own money so I can build factories  that easy when they are asking charms as payment.
reviews.author: Kristine Anne Macdon

reviews.title: Cute, fun &, easy
reviews.comment: I love this game . I like setting up all my candy factories. So cute.
reviews.author: Pamela Riley DiCarlo

reviews.title: Good but needs bugs fixing
reviews.comment: Love this game and it is veey addictive, but there are a few bugs where gifts from the mini games aren\'t recieved, and a lot of the factories etc need to be paid for with charms, which are very very rarely given. Seems the only way to play it properly is to purchase charms, which I will not do
reviews.author: Emma Donovan

reviews.comment: Nice
reviews.author: Amal Abutaleb

reviews.title: Please
reviews.comment: I hope we can change coins into charms. Way too much thing need charms. App stop popping out please. Candy will be gone when close app and no coins earn. Please fix it. Cause i like this game.
reviews.author: Evangeline Tay

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great game ever,but it keeps logging,please fix it and i will give it 5 stars for sure
reviews.author: Mark Lester Billones

reviews.title: Ignored my payment for charms
reviews.comment: I have to say I was addicted to this game. The ads let it down & it crashes my phone when having to click back from the play store. I paid $4.99 for some charms a month ago but despite emailing the team I have still not heard anything & have not received charms & still getting the ads. I feel robbed by a mickey mouse company. I\'ll happily retract this if my issue is sorted ASAP
reviews.author: becky cotton
